pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `resotolib`Resoto common library## Table of contents* [Overview](#overview)* [Contact](#contact)* [License](#license)## OverviewThis is the Resoto common library. Any functionality that is required by more than one of [our components](https://github.com/someengineering/resoto#component-list) will be put in here.## ContactIf you have any questions feel free to [join our Discord](https://discord.gg/someengineering) or [open a GitHub issue](https://github.com/someengineering/resoto/issues/new).## LicenseSee [LICENSE](../LICENSE) for details.
